explore.title: Explore
explore.subtitle: This app includes example code to help you get started.

platformSupport.title: Android, iOS, and web support
platformSupport.description: You can open this project on Android, iOS, and the web. To open the web version, press
platformSupport.inTerminal: in the terminal running this project.

images.title: Images
images.description: For static images, you can use the
images.suffixes: suffixes to provide files for different screen densities

colorModes.title: Light and dark mode components
colorModes.description: This template has light and dark mode support. The
colorModes.hook: hook lets you inspect what the user's current color scheme is, and so you can adjust UI colors accordingly.

animations.title: Animations
animations.description: This template includes an example of an animated component. The
animations.library: library to create a waving hand animation.
animations.parallaxDescription: component provides a parallax effect for the header image.
